items.title: About
items.summary: Hello! Welcome to StudioChords. My name is Rish & I'm a guitar & piano teacher. I have taught 100+ students…
items.content_html:
Hello! Welcome to StudioChords. My name is Rish & I'm a guitar & piano teacher.

I have taught 100+ students so far via online training of guitar & piano.

This website is the best resource if you're looking for accurate chords of some of the most famous songs in Bollywood

If you want to enroll in personal online music coaching, be sure to contact me below

Contact Me
